description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Porto, Portugal. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Five-Star Porto Seaside Manor with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: From the sweetness of its namesake wine to the terracotta rooftops bathed in the Mediterranean sun, Porto exudes an undeniable romance - and the hilltop manor that is Vila Foz Hotel & Spa, is the ultimate launchpad. Look out over the sparkling blue waves of the Atlantic from this five-star gem located just moments from the city's greatest attractions. Exceptional facilities ensure a comfortable stay. Dine at the Michelin Starred Vila Foz Restaurant where the freshest catch of the day awaits and toast at the grand bar which evokes the beauty of yesteryear with vintage interiors, ocean views, and an extensive cocktail and wine list. Soothe the mind and body with pampering, tailor-made spa treatments, an indoor swimming pool, steamy sauna and Turkish bath. Enjoy the very best of Porto on your doorstep: located in one of the most prestigious neighbourhoods, Foz is a seafront neighbourhood, only a 10-minute drive from the city centre. In the city, you'll find local restaurants, small, unique shops and a golden coastline. Wine lovers can explore the world-renowned Douro Valley, with tours departing daily.

hotels.vendor_name: Maison Albar Hotel - Le Monumental Palace
hotels.title: French-Inspired Five-Star Elegance in the Heart of Historic Porto
hotels.description: Discover the narrow cobbled streets and baroque architecture of Porto from the French-inspired five-star Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace, your luxe launchpad to this Portuguese coastal city. A location right in Porto's historic heart means you are within walking distance of must-see architectural masterpieces such as the ornate churches of Igreja do Carmo and Igreja dos Clérigos, Câmara Municipal do Porto town hall and the neoclassical Bolsa Palace. For beautiful views of the river and city, take the 10-minute stroll to Luís I Bridge - for contrast, visit at least once during the day and again at sunset. The luxurious Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace, part of the renowned Leading Hotels of the World collection, is an architectural wonder in itself. Standing proud since 1930, its exquisite exteriors give way to modern comforts and five-star facilities. From the revered cuisine of Michelin-starred French chef Julien Montbabut at Le Monument to the unique Japanese fusion of internationally-acclaimed Portuguese chef Olivier Da Costa at Yakuza, the hotel's dining owns understated elegance. Meanwhile, Le Spa Nuxe is on hand to pamper weary travellers with signature facial and body treatments, perfectly complemented by a session at the indoor pool, sauna and hammam.

hotels.title: International Luxury within Portugal's Historic Port Wine Capital
hotels.description: In the heart of Portugal's port wine capital, Crowne Plaza Porto, an IHG Hotel, is an urban oasis for good food, wine and relaxation. Savour succulent seafood at SOMOS Restaurant & Lounge, indulge in a tranquil treatment at Mandalay Wellness or reinvigorate your body at the onsite fitness centre. Experience the port wine of this magnificent city, marvel at heritage architecture or stroll along Ponte da Arrabida before returning for a well-earned rest.

hotels.title: Five-Star Portugal Palace Escape in the Heart of Porto
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in Porto's beautiful culture and history with a lavish stay at InterContinental Porto - Palácio Das Cardosas, an IHG Hotel, ideally located in the heart of the picturesque Portuguese city. Built in a beautifully restored, 18th-century palace, this stunning hotel is ideal for couples and families wanting to indulge in a city break. Explore the alley-woven streets, soak in the ancestry of Porto's most significant structures and indulge in authentic Portuguese cuisine at the hotel's Astoria Restaurant.

hotels.title: Five-Star Porto Heritage Palace Luxury
hotels.description: Embrace the romance and regality of Porto with an escape at Torel Palace Porto, a luxurious five-star hotel housed in a stunningly restored Romantic-era palace. This ornate oasis, once known as the Palacete Campos Navarro, takes pride of place in the middle of Porto, just steps from Batalha Square and its striking Santo Ildefonso Church, the famous Bolháo food market, and iconic shopping strip Rua Santa Catarina. There’s no mistaking the palatial property - the jewel in its crown is a stunning skylight (claraboia), which floods the interiors with natural light, illuminating the beautifully restored stucco details, artwork and opulent textures. Each room and suite takes inspiration from the works of a regarded Portuguese writer or poet, including Florbela Espanca, José Régio and Miguel Torga, honouring their contribution to the country's cultural tapestry. Cosy up in the peaceful library or while away the day on the terrace. Continue the descent into serenity with a massage or scrub at CALLA Wellness Suite, or feast at the atmospheric BLIND Restaurant & Bar, inspired by Nobel laureate writer José Saramago, with sense-led dishes that celebrate Porto’s bounty of local and seasonal produce.

hotels.title: Five-Star Portugal Luxury Escape with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Wine Cellar
hotels.description: Discover Portugal in unparalleled luxury with a stay at The Yeatman Hotel, a five-star establishment with a distinguished wine cellar and restaurant boasting two Michelin stars. Treat yourself to innovative cuisine inspired by traditional flavours at the Yeatman Gastronomic Restaurant, and dive into the extensive collection of wines that inspire the décor of the hotel. Glowing infinity pools and views over Porto and the Douro River put the finishing touches on an indulgent experience.

hotels.title: Five-Star Art-Inspired Porto Escape with River-View Pool
hotels.description: Centuries of culture, art and tradition are at your fingertips with a stay at Torel Avantgarde, Porto, a designer boutique hotel inspired by history’s most creative figures. Sitting high above the Portuguese coastal city, looking over rooftops to the river below, this five-star hotel is perfectly positioned for days spent exploring the city’s laneways and attractions. Wander through trendy art district Rua Miguel Bombarda or stroll to Livraria Lello bookstore, Crystal Palace gardens, Clérigos Church or Rua das Flores - all within 750m of the hotel’s imposing carved doors. Taking both its name and design from the avant-garde era, this boutique art hotel celebrates the elegance of the 1930s alongside contemporary Portuguese artisanship. Each room takes on the personality of a painter, writer, designer or musician, and is decorated to reflect their personality and work - think Nina Simone, Joan Miro, Janis Joplin, Charlie Chaplin or Frida Kahlo. The common spaces are similarly Instagram-ready - snap a shot in front of the floral ceiling and rose walls of the onsite bar, dine at the Digby restaurant or take a dip in the pool while admiring the jaw-dropping views of the river below. Take a moment out at Calla Wellness & Spa with a massage or facial, or indulge with a meal at Sir Digby, the contemporary Portuguese restaurant and bar with two alfresco terraces.

hotels.title: Top-Rated Porto Heritage Palace Escape
hotels.description: Experience the grandeur of Portuguese royalty with a stay at Torel 1884 Suites & Apartments, consistently ranked among the top hotels in Porto on Tripadvisor. Housed in a former palace dating back to 1884, this historic hotel is now a slice of sophisticated extravagance in the heart of the city, sitting just metres from some of Porto’s best sites, including the iconic Rua das Flores. If you fancy venturing a little further afield, São Bento train and metro station is a three-minute walk away. Each room in this palatial building combines original features with styling inspired by the discoveries of Portuguese explorers as they travelled across Africa, America and Asia - think coffee, porcelain, cardamom and silk. Retreat to the top-floor library and lounge to escape reality with a good book (with tomes available in English, French, German, Portuguese and Japanese), or join the locals at Bartolomeu, the ground-floor bistro and wine bar, dishing up Portuguese flavours with a French twist. Make your way through the primarily Portuguese wine list or book in for a private tasting in the former bank safes, now storing liquid currency.

hotels.title: Porto Picturesque Stay near Porto Cathedral and Cais da Ribeira
hotels.description: Showcasing stunning architecture and with a vibrant riverside location, Vignette Collection Casa de Companhia, an IHG Hotel, is a five-star gateway to picturesque Porto. Rest in elegant and bright guestrooms or re-energise your body in the fully-equipped fitness centre. Savour Portuguese cuisine or indulge in a glass of Duoro port wine at the onsite bar. Venture out to explore cathedrals, museums and heritage sites or take in the views from the outdoor pool.
